竟.definition: unexpectedly; actually; to go so far as to; indeed

竟敢.definition: to have the impertinence; to have the cheek to

竟然.definition: unexpectedly; to one's surprise; in spite of everything; in that crazy way; actually; to go as far as to

竟陵.definition: Jingling, former name of Tianmen 天門|天门, Hubei
